channel.title: My FIRST SCRIPT! >> The Buzzer Game, AND WORKING! :)
channel.description:
[b]Hi all, I made my first script yesterday (25th Jan I think) nd it actually works! It only does 3 and 1/2 levels so far, but its still cool. Earns 1600 NPS in like 2 mins :). It automatically plays it 3 times for you aswell.
I also made an Attack Of The Marblemen script aswell, that finishes level 14. Ill add more levels when I can be bothered :|
Tell me if they work for you, and if you like 'em!. Remember, 800x600 ONLY!
Ricky[/b]

item.title: My FIRST SCRIPT! >> The Buzzer Game, AND WORKING! :)

item.title: My FIRST SCRIPT! >> The Buzzer Game, AND WORKING! :)
item.dc:creator: @zdarkmage77 zdarkmage77
item.description:
@zdarkmage77 wrote:

i cant make a ****ing peanut dash thing work, so it if u make one, TELL ME!!!!
i'm pretty sure you can go find one in your scar folder (.../scar(#)/Neopets/penut.scar) or just get one here (note that i just kinda changed someone else's (probably freddy's kaitneik's) script a little and added in some comments (though they're really messy and probably all wrong) :P : [code]program peanutFIX;//program name and beginning

var//declares variable declaration
x,y: Integer;//declares variables x and y as integers

//edited
procedure Charge;//declares name of the procedure as ‘Charge’
begin//start of procedure
repeat//loop start
SendArrowSilent(3);//presses left
SendArrowSilent(1);//presses right
//edited
until(GetColor(161, 350) = 255);//until the red energy bar is two pixels from the end
SendArrowSilent(0);//presses up (releases peanut)
end;//end of procedure

procedure DoubleBackFlip;//declares name of the procedure as ‘DoubleBackFlip’
begin//start of procedure
SendArrowSilent(3);//presses left
SendArrowSilent(1);//presses right
SendArrowSilent(3);//presses left
SendArrowSilent(1);//presses right
SendArrowSilent(0);//presses up
end;//end of procedure

//edited
procedure Run;//declares name of the procedure ‘Run’
begin//start of procedure
repeat//start of loop
SendArrowSilent(1);//runs forward right
//edited
Wait(50+random(4));//waits
until(GetColor(360, 240) = 16676470);//until it reaches close to the end
repeat//start of loop
//edited
if (FindColor(x, y, 3568020, 375, 200, 485, 308)) then DoubleBackFlip;//if finds log then DoubleBackFlips
//edited
if (FindColor(x, y, 6189691, 1, 85, 490, 400)) then DoubleBackFlip;//if finds peanut then DoubleBackFlips
until(getcolor(112, 117) = 14777660)//until finds progress window
MoveMouseSmooth(156, 115);//moves to continue
ClickMouse(156, 115, True);//clicks continue
end;//end of procedure

begin//begin of main process
repeat//start loop
//edited
Charge;//charges up
//edited
Wait(5000+random(50));//waits till peanut flies
//edited
Run;//runs for it
until(getcolor(58,223)=16777215);//untiil finds game over
end.//end of main process[/code]

Read full topic
